entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or rain beginning early this evening then changing to periods of rain late this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
